channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chargersâ€™ Omarion Hampton rushes for five-yard TD, extending lead over Cowboys | NFL Highlights
item.description: Omarion Hampton rushed for a five-yard touchdown that gave the Los Angeles Chargers a 34-17 lead over the Dallas Cowboys.

item.title: Jay Glazer: The Moment That Changed Bears' Season and Led to Epic Win vs. Packers
item.description: The Bears' comeback victory over the Packers on Saturday was nearly two months in the making, FOX Sports NFL insider Jay Glazer shared.

item.title: Should Group of 5 Teams get automatic bids to CFP? Joel Klatt thinks they shouldn't
item.description: Joel Klatt discussed why he believe Group of 5 teams shouldn't get an automatic bid to the College Football Playoff.

item.title: Panthers' Bryce Young scrambles & finds Ja'Tavion Sanders for go-ahead TD against Buccaneers | NFL Highlights
item.description: Carolina Panthers' Bryce Young scrambled & found Ja'Tavion Sanders for the go-ahead touchdown against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

item.title: Joel Klatt breaks down Alabama's impressive win over Oklahoma in CFP, previews Rose Bowl vs. Indiana
item.description: Joel Klatt broke down the Alabama Crimson Tide's 34-24 win over the Oklahoma Sooner in the CFP. He also previewed Alabama's matchup against the Indian...

item.title: Inside the Bears' wild comeback win over the Packers in OT
item.description: Caleb Williams, Cairo Santos, DJ Moore and Jahdae Walker were key parts of a wild night in Chicago.

item.title: Vikings QB McCarthy ruled out with hand injury
item.description: Vikings quarterback J.J. McCarthy suffered a hand injury in Sunday's game against the Giants.

item.title: Browns standout rookie RB Judkins carted off
item.description: Browns rookie running back Quinshon Judkins left Sunday's game against the Buffalo Bills on a cart after suffering a right leg injury.

item.title: Chiefs down to QB3 after Minshew injured, exits
item.description: Chiefs quarterback Gardner Minshew sustained a left knee injury in the opening minute against the Titans, left the game before halftime and was ruled ...

item.title: Man United's issues laid bare while Aston Villa enter title race with gritty win
item.description: Problems are mounting for Man United after Sunday's defeat, a result that vaulted Aston Villa into the title race. Can Amorim & Co. turn this around w...
